chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
aemi: applied_entries_monotonic_interface
smci: state_machine_correct_interface
si: sorted_interface
lacimi: lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
client: clientId
id: nat
out: output

Goal:
forall (e : entry) (l : list entry), In e (deduplicate_log l) -> In e l

Premises:

maxIndex_removeAfterIndex : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) = i
deduplicate_log'_In_if : forall (e : entry) (l : list entry) (ks : list (clientId * nat)), In e (deduplicate_log' l ks) -> In e l
applyEntry_stateMachine_correct : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) (l : list output) (st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (es : list entry), applyEntry st e = (l, st') -> stateMachine st = snd (execute_log (deduplicate_log es)) -> (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eClient e' = eClient e -> eId e' < eId e) -> stateMachine st' = snd (execute_log (deduplicate_log es ++ [e]))
prefix_contiguous : forall (l l' : list entry) (e : entry) (i : nat), l' <> [] -> Prefix l' l -> sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e > i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' i -> In e l'
commitIndex_lastApplied_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), commitIndex (nwState net h') <= lastApplied (nwState net h) -> eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h') -> In e (log (nwState net h')) < -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments commitIndex_lastApplied_match {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lastApplied_lastApplied_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), lastApplied (nwState net h') <= lastApplied (nwState net h) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h') -> In e (log (nwState net h')) < -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments lastApplied_lastApplied_match {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lastApplied_commitIndex_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), lastApplied (nwState net h') <= commitIndex (nwState net h) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h') -> In e (log (nwState net h')) < -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments lastApplied_commitIndex_match {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
packets_gt_prevIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eIndex e > pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_gt_prevIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
packets_ge_prevTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eTerm e >= plt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_ge_prevTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
applyEntry_output_correct : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) (l : list output) (st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (o : output) (es : list entry), applyEntry st e = (l, st') -> In o l -> stateMachine st = snd (execute_log (deduplicate_log es)) -> (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eClient e' = eClient e -> eId e' < eId e) -> output_correct (eClient e) (eId e) o (es ++ [e])
findGtIndex_sufficient : forall (e : entry) (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> In e entries -> eIndex e > x -> In e (findGtIndex entries x)
sorted_app_In_reduce : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (e1 e2 : entry), sorted (l1 ++ [e1]) -> sorted (l2 ++ [e2]) -> eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> (forall e : entry, In e (l1 ++ [e1]) -> In e (l2 ++ [e2])) -> forall e : entry, In e l1 -> In e l2
deduplicate_log_snoc_drop : forall (es : list entry) (e e' : entry), In e' es -> eClient e = eClient e' -> eId e <= eId e' -> deduplicate_log (es ++ [e]) = deduplicate_log es

removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient' : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l 0 -> (forall e : entry, In e l' -> 0 < eIndex e) -> x <= maxIndex l -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x
cons_contiguous_sorted : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat) (a : entry), sorted (a :: l) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (a :: l) i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i
log_matching_hosts = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => (forall h h' : Net.name, entries_match (log (nwState net h)) (log (nwState net h'))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (i : nat), 1 <= i <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e (log (nwState net h))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eIndex e > 0) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_matching_hosts {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
client_cache_complete = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h))) -> exists (id : nat) (o : output), getLastId (nwState net h) (eClient e) = Some (id, o) /\ eId e <= id : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments client_cache_complete {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
deduplicate_log'_snoc_drop_es : forall (es : list entry) (ks : list (clientId * nat)) (e e' : entry), In e' es -> eClient e = eClient e' -> eId e <= eId e' -> deduplicate_log' (es ++ [e]) ks = deduplicate_log' es ks
entries_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (entries entries' : list entry) => forall e e' e'' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' entries' -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e -> In e'' entries < -> In e'' entries' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments entries_match {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
in_cons : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b l -> In b (a :: l)
removeAfterIndex_in : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (a : entry), In a (removeAfterIndex l i) -> In a l
deduplicate_log_snoc_split : forall (es : list entry) (e : entry), (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eClient e' = eClient e -> eId e' < eId e) -> deduplicate_log (es ++ [e]) = deduplicate_log es ++ [e]
cacheApplyEntry_stateMachine_correct : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) (l : list output) (st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (es : list entry), cacheApplyEntry st e = (l, st') -> stateMachine st = snd (execute_log (deduplicate_log es)) -> (forall (c : clientId) (i : nat) (o : output), getLastId st c = Some (i, o) -> exists e0 : entry, In e0 es /\ eClient e0 = c /\ eId e0 = i) ->...-> stateMachine st' = snd (execute_log (deduplicate_log (es ++ [e])))
cacheApplyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => match getLastId st (eClient e) with | Some (id, o) => if eId e <? id then ([], st) else if eId e =? id then ([o], st) else applyEntry st e | None => applyEntry st e end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> entry -> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments cacheApplyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
removeIncorrect_new_contiguous : forall (new current : list entry) (prev : nat) (e : entry), sorted current -> uniqueIndices current -> (forall e0 e' : entry, eIndex e0 = eIndex e' -> eTerm e0 = eTerm e' -> In e0 new -> In e' current -> e0 = e') -> contiguous_range_exact_lo current 0 -> contiguous_range_exact_lo new prev -> In e current -> eIndex e = prev -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (new ++ removeAfterIndex current prev) 0
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
thing : forall (es l l' : list entry) (e e' : entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> entries_match l l' -> es <> [] -> Prefix es l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es (eIndex e) -> In e l -> In e' l' -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> es ++ removeAfterIndex l (eIndex e) = l'
contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (leaderLog entries : list entry) => (prevLogIndex = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex leaderLog prevLogIndex = Some e /\ eTerm e = prevLogTerm)) /\ (forall e : entry, In e leaderLog -> eIndex e > prevLogIndex -> eIndex e <= maxIndex entries -> In e entries) /\ (forall e e' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' leaderLog -> e = e') : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), logIndex -> term -> list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments contiguous {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
applied_entries_monotonic : forall (e : entry) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (os : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') os -> In e (applied_entries (nwState net)) -> In e (applied_entries (nwState net'))
deduplicate_log_cases : forall (es : list entry) (e : entry), deduplicate_log (es ++ [e]) = deduplicate_log es /\ (exists e' : entry, In e' es /\ eClient e' = eClient e /\ eId e <= eId e') \/ deduplicate_log (es ++ [e]) = deduplicate_log es ++ [e] /\ (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eClient e' = eClient e -> eId e' < eId e)
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
in_eq : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a (a :: l)
log_matching_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit ->...-> Prop Arguments log_matching_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
findGtIndex_contiguous : forall (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e entries /\ eIndex e = i) -> forall i : nat, x < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e (findGtIndex entries x) /\ eIndex e = i
contiguous_sorted_subset_prefix : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (i : nat), contiguous_range_exact_lo l1 i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l2 i -> sorted l1 -> sorted l2 -> (forall e : entry, In e l1 -> In e l2) -> Prefix (rev l1) (rev l2)

```coq
intros e l H.
unfold deduplicate_log in H.
rewrite deduplicate_log'_In_if in H.
apply H.
```
